sentences.sContent: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
sentences.sCn: 我扣着钱，直到他们完工。

sentences.sContent: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
sentences.sCn: 伊恩被控向警方隐瞒重要信息。

remMethod.val: with(向后) + hold(保留， 控制) → 向后控制 → 拒绝； 抑制

trans.tranCn: 拒绝， 不给； 抑制， 制止
trans.tranOther: to refuse to give someone something
